Apr 11

Deepest darkest sea creatures

poems and not-poems

so you think you can live:

the truth
my aunt died alone
on the floor of
the house she grew up in
with a handful of diet
pills and an unlocked
door and…medium.com

Our Townie:

this town
can I just say
that I know this town
better than my pockets
the backs of my hands
better than that small lie
in the…medium.com

alt Maslow:

the four
basic human wantsmedium.com

please don’t shoot the music:

No photos
When you see someone play music
Really play music
You cannot take a photo.medium.com

MEEEP MEEEP MEEEP:

the most sensitive person in the universe pt 1
Flickering lights slip through Amazon’s 4.3 star rated blackout shades and a siren’s squeak sneaks through noise…medium.com

“assemble small boats of love”:

Five Poems, by Jeff Whitney
“in this dream / no child was ever killed by a government / bullet”electricliterature.com

Center Stage-ish:

Still Too Gay to be an Actor
Jimmy Tripp. Actor. Teacher. Homo.medium.com

when you eat a star:

8.
I will swallow the sun
And then when I 
Weep or laugh
It will
Escape in pieces
Small enough for you to
Holdmedium.com

i train myself to avoid the things i love the most:

Learned Reaction
I am between not knowing what love is and
holding onto it like a balloon that is
about to burst in my hands.medium.com

hearts on sleeves on sale:

inner monologue
Make use of
this freakish heart.
Display it-
maybe it could
still be something,
if not loved.
Yes.
Let it struggle
to…medium.com

what is beauty anyway, i mean really:

The Story of an Ugly Trans Girl
I don’t know if Medium is for telling (relatively) simple autobiographies, but since I think mine has some value beyond…medium.com

Feat. Matt Vercillo, sink or swim, Kellan Kryak, Amy McEwan, Nick Chmura, Okey-Panky, Adam John Roper, Nina Szarka, Ali Guerra, and Mike
